title: 1976 - Redneck Miller (Newly Restored) Tarantino Approved: 70s Cult Film

sources.title: 1976 - Redneck Miller (Newly Restored) Tarantino Approved: 70s Cult Film
sources.description:
A rare "Hicksploitation" film from 1976 Newly restored from original archival film elements! 
When DJ Miller's motorcycle is stolen and used in a drug deal, this smooth-talking radio host lands in hot water with local gangsters. Now he's got to clear his name while dodging thugs, charming ladies, and spinning the hottest country tracks in town. 

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/LZoFudtkKE8
